about_the_game: This game captivates players with its stunning palace settings, meticulously crafted visuals that transport you to the splendor of ancient times. Accompanied by traditional music, the melodic tunes enhance the mystery and solemnity as players delve deeper into the world. Players assume the role of an exquisite anime loli character, navigating through a realm filled with fantastical elements. Progression in the story is driven by interactions with NPCs, where conversations can lead to new quests or uncover hidden secrets. The objective often involves treasure hunting based on mission prompts, each discovery potentially unlocking new storylines or mysteries. From character design to environmental construction, the game strives to recreate a real yet dreamlike ancient world, offering players a visual feast alongside rich narratives and challenging gameplay.

name: Juxtapose

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2125 / AMD A10-7850K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 / AMD Radeon R7 Graphics
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
